qas.question: What industry generates 1.2 billion in economic activity each year for North carolina?
How many full time jobs are held by those in the non profit arts and culture industry?
How much money does the nonprofit arts and culture industry raise for government?
What was the first museum in the country to be formed by legislature?
How much money does the North Carolina Museum of art generate?

context: North Carolina has rich traditions in art, music, and cuisine. The <a0_0>nonprofit arts and culture<a0_0/> industry generates $1.2 billion in direct economic activity in North Carolina, supporting more than <a1_0>43,600<a1_0/> full-time equivalent jobs and generating <a2_0>$119 million<a2_0/> in revenue for local governments and the state of North Carolina. North Carolina established the <a3_0>North Carolina Museum of Art<a3_0/> as the first major museum collection in the country to be formed by state legislation and funding and continues to bring <a4_0>millions<a4_0/> into the NC economy. Also see this list of museums in North Carolina.
